pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, November 5, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Chair of the Board and Chief Executive Officer of the Centre d’entreprises et d’innovation de Montréal Hélène Desmarais.

Carlton Room, Third Floor
The Ritz-Carlton Hotel
1228 rue Sherbrooke Ouest

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Chair of the Board of Transcontinental Inc. Isabelle Marcoux.

Carlton Room, Third Floor
The Ritz-Carlton Hotel
1228 rue Sherbrooke Ouest

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:00 p.m.

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Chief Executive Officer of Siemens USA Barbara Humpton.

Carlton Room, Third Floor
The Ritz-Carlton Hotel
1228 rue Sherbrooke Ouest

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:00 p.m.

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with President and Chief Executive Officer of Lockheed Martin Marillyn A. Hewson.

Carlton Room, Third Floor
The Ritz-Carlton Hotel
1228 rue Sherbrooke Ouest

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:00 p.m.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Vice President of the European Commission Federica Mogherini.

Carlton Room, Third Floor
The Ritz-Carlton Hotel
1228 rue Sherbrooke Ouest

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:00 p.m.

7:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks and participate in an armchair discussion at the Most Powerful Women International Summit gala.

Ballroom, First Floor
The Ritz-Carlton Hotel
1228 rue Sherbrooke Ouest

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to present themselves to Media Registration no later than 6:30 p.m.
